description: The small-flowered anemone (Anemone parviflora) is an amazing groundcover plant with an abundance of white, daisy-like flowers. They are well-suited to temperate climates, have excellent drought tolerance and are easy to maintain. Due to its self-propagating nature, this perennial grows quickly and can cover large areas in a few years. Beautiful and long-lasting, the flowers attract a variety of pollinators such as bees, butterflies and hummingbirds, making it an ideal choice for wildlife gardens. This versatile plant adds a carpet of spring beauty to any outdoor landscape.
